summary: This is a brief email from September 4, 2019, inquiring about the amount of data on a drive that was provided the previous week, in order to gauge the scale of an anticipated review. The sender is asking 'M' for this information.

events.title: Data Drive Handover
events.description: A data drive was given to the recipient, 'M', the week prior to this email.

events.title: Email Inquiry About Data
events.description: An email was sent inquiring about the amount of data on a drive that was provided the previous week, to understand the scale of an upcoming review.

keyFacts: An email was sent on September 4, 2019, regarding a data drive provided the previous week.
The purpose of the inquiry was to assess the scale of an 'anticipate[d] review' of the data.
The correspondence is brief and sent from a mobile device, indicating informal communication.
